sentences.en: Arid and extremely arid land are deserts, and semiarid grasslands generally are referred to as steppes.
sentences.cn: 干旱和极度干旱的土地是沙漠, 半干旱草原和通常被称为草原.

sentences.en: Arid regions cober arid and semiarid areas.
sentences.cn: 旱区包括干旱区和半干旱区.

sentences.en: Desertification drains an arid or semiarid land of its life - supporting capabilities.
sentences.cn: 沙漠化使干旱或半干旱地区维持生命的能力逐渐枯竭.

sentences.en: Dryland farming is such an agricultural type fed by annual rainfall in arid and semiarid area.
sentences.cn: 旱地农业是指干旱、半干旱区的雨养农业.

sentences.en: North China is situated in arid and semiarid regions.
sentences.cn: 摘要华北地区位于干旱和半干旱地区.

sentences.en: Shortage of water resources restricted agricultural production in arid and semiarid region.
sentences.cn: 水资源紧缺限制了干旱半干旱地区农业生产.

sentences.en: Soil microbiotic crust is developed broadly and has an ecological significance in arid and semiarid regions.
sentences.cn: 土壤微生物结皮广泛存在于干旱半干旱地区,且具有重要的生态学意义.

sentences.en: Terpenoids are more prevalent in some arid or semiarid climates.
sentences.cn: 萜类在某些干旱或半干旱气候条件下较为普遍.

sentences.en: The region is semiarid to arid in overall climate.
sentences.cn: 这个地区总体上是半干旱至干旱气候.

sentences.en: The salinity of lake water is a sensitive monitor of climate in arid and semiarid region.
sentences.cn: 在干旱半干旱地区,封闭湖泊的湖水盐度对气候变化反应敏感.

trans.tran_cn: 雨量非常少的，半干旱的，半旱性
trans.tran_en: characterized by scanty rainfall and scrubby vegetation, often occurring in continental interiors
